com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui

Class SpenSettingEraserLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui.SpenSettingEraserLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent

    public class SpenSettingEraserLayout
extends LinearLayout
    This class provides methods for managing the eraser layout.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      This listener interface provides callback methods to receive the response to Clear All requests.
      static interface  SpenSettingEraserLayout.ViewListener
      Listeners to inform View visibility changed

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingEraserLayout

        public SpenSettingEraserLayout(Context context,
                       String customImagePath,
                       RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Creates an SpenSettingEraserLayout instance with the specified image file path and relative layout.
        Eraser Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application and must be not null.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String) and must be not null.
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout and must be not null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingEraserLayout

        public SpenSettingEraserLayout(Context context,
                       String customImagePath,
                       RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                       float ratio)
        Creates an SpenSettingEraserLayout instance with the specified image file path, relative layout, and ratio.
        Eraser Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application and must be not null.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String) and must be not null.
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout and must be not null.
        ratio - [in] The overall size adjustment ratio and ratio must greater than 0. If ratio is larger than 2.0f, it will be set to 2.0f.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - If ratio is too large, bitmap size exceeds VM budget. Therefore, please consider your ratio carefully, bitmaps can quickly consume your available memory budget leading to an application crash due to the dreaded exception.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setIndicatorPosition

        public void setIndicatorPosition(int x)
        Set the specified position for the popup indicator.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the popup indicator in pixels. If X is less than 0, indicator will be inVisible. If X is greater than setting layout's width, indicator will show on the right side of setting layout.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,

        Parameters:

        y - The Y coordinate of the popup in pixels.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setEraserInfoList

        public void setEraserInfoList(SpenSettingEraserInfo[] list)
        Set the specified eraser settings information list. 
         mEraserDataList = new SpenSettingEraserInfo[SpenSettingEraserInfo.ERASER_TYPE_TEXT + 1];
 SpenSettingEraserInfo penEraser = new SpenSettingEraserInfo();
 SpenSettingEraserInfo textEraser = new SpenSettingEraserInfo();
 penEraser.size = 5;
 textEraser.size = 5;
 mEraserDataList[SpenSettingEraserInfo.ERASER_TYPE_PEN] = penEraser;
 mEraserDataList[SpenSettingEraserInfo.ERASER_TYPE_TEXT] = textEraser;
 
 mSettingView.setEraserInfoList(mEraserDataList);
        Parameters:
        list - List The eraser settings information list. SpenSettingEraserInfo
        Since:
        3.0.0
